trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA304_03045_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana seeks an adventurer with a green thumb.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA304_03045_TODO_00<tab>Use the preservative tonic on the contaminated roots of the Percipient One.

TEXT_BANANA304_03045_ESHANA_000_000<tab>In an effort to improve relationsss with Gridania, Captain Alpa has proposed a joint initiative to revitalize the Percipient One and cleanse the sssurrounding land.

TEXT_BANANA304_03045_ESHANA_000_001<tab>The Gridanians have offered to provide elixirs that will purify the sssoil, and we, for our part, have prepared a tonic to guard the rootsss from rot and decay.
TEXT_BANANA304_03045_ESHANA_000_002<tab>Pray take these two vials of tonic to the Percipient One and pour them onto its rootsss.
TEXT_BANANA304_03045_ESHANA_000_020<tab>You are returned. The deed is done, then?

TEXT_BANANA304_03045_ESHANA_000_021<tab>Excellent. It has been many moons since we have had need of sssuch a potion. Its preservative properties allow plants to thrive in even the harshessst of conditions.
TEXT_BANANA304_03045_ESHANA_000_022<tab>Never did I imagine it would serve to nurture the Percipient One. To return to its former glory will take time, as well as additional treatments of our tonic.
TEXT_BANANA304_03045_ESHANA_000_023<tab>I trussst we can count on your aid when we have need of it again.
